title: Contract Management
content:
Contract management or contract administration is the management of contracts made with vendors / customers.

Contract management includes:

  • Negotiating the terms and conditions of contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions
  • Documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during the implementation or execution of the contract.
